imdb.plot outline: In each half-hour episode of this series, host Mary Rose Bacani presents "virtues in action" in our Catholic school community, in our personal lives, and in the lives of young people who have followed the call to priestly or religious life.
imdb.title: The World I Know: Virtues in Action
akas: The World I Know: Virtues in Action (Canada)

production companies.name: Salt and Light Catholic Media Foundation

plot: In each half-hour episode of this series, host Mary Rose Bacani presents "virtues in action" in our Catholic school community, in our personal lives, and in the lives of young people who have followed the call to priestly or religious life.::Salt and Light Catholic Media Foundation
